result.reason: mRemoteNG embeds external terminal clients (PuTTY/KiTTY) for SSH sessions and has no direct access to their terminal output buffer, making in-app output filtering infeasible without replacing the terminal emulator
result.approach: Would require either building a custom terminal emulator or hooking into PuTTY's output buffer, both of which are out of scope for the current architecture

attempts.raw_output:
This is a feature request to add search/filter functionality to the terminal output panel. mRemoteNG doesn't have its own terminal output view for SSH connections (it embeds PuTTY), so the "output" likely refers to the Notifications/ErrorAndInfo panel or is about adding search capability to embedded terminal sessions. This is a non-trivial enhancement request.
